data.title: Amazon says its facial recognition can now identify fear
data.text: Amazon claimed this week its facial recognition software, Rekognition, can now detect a person's fear on top of accurately identifying other emotions.

data.title: Google, Facebook, Amazon to testify in U.S. against French digital tax
data.text: Alphabet Inc's Google unit, Facebook Inc and Amazon.com Inc are among the companies that will testify Monday at a U.S. government hearing on the French government's digital services tax.

data.title: Amazon's Prime Day promotion pumped up July's total retail sales, BofA says
data.text: Amazon's Prime Day and other retail promotions appear to have given a meaningful pop to July retail sales.

data.title: Amazon Wants to Buy a 10% Stake in India's Second-Largest Grocery Chain
data.text: Owning part of Future Retail Ltd. would give the e-commerce giant greater access to India's 1.3 billion-plus potential shoppers.

data.title: Bernie Sanders echoes Trump accusation that Amazon influences Washington Post coverage
data.text: Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos’ ownership of The Washington Post is uniting two ideologically opposed politicians frustrated with the newspaper’s media coverage of them.

data.title: The Government Is a Threat to Amazon Stock, and You Should Be Worried
data.text: Amazon is stepping up its lobby game as it faces increasing regulatory scrutiny. This will be a major and persistent problem for AMZN stock.

data.title: American consumers are worrying more about Amazon's power, a new CNBC survey finds
data.text: There's been a steady slide toward pessimism among the American public when the topic is Amazon. Whether influenced by politics or not, the changing attitudes may reflect a changing understanding of their role as consumers.

data.title: 3 Great Tech Stocks to Buy for the Future
data.text: When geopolitical worries abate, AMZN, AMD and IBM are stocks to buy. They will continue to dominate their competition.

data.title: Amazon's Latest Effort to Take On the Competition and Regulators
data.text: The e-commerce titan wants to control the price of third-party items sold on its marketplace.

data.title: A Share Buyback Is Coming: Amazon Is A Conviction Buy
data.text: AMZN has always looked expensive because investors have focused on trailing numbers.

data.title: 5 Reasons Why You Really Should Consider Selling Amazon Stock
data.text: AMZN is facing many challenges and many risks. As a result, it's definitely time for longer-term investors to sell Amazon stock.

data.title: Here's Why The Trade Desk Called Its Deal With Amazon a "Game Changer"
data.text: The e-commerce giant took a few bricks out of its walled garden.

data.title: 7 AI Stocks to Watch With Strong Long-Term Narratives
data.text: Although AI stocks have generated news recently for the wrong reasons, the sector remains a viable, long-term opportunity.

data.title: Amazon in talks to buy up to 10% stake in India's Future Retail: Bloomberg
data.text: Amazon.com Inc  is in late-stage talks to buy as much as 10% of India's Future Retail Ltd , Bloomberg reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.
